summary.span: 代表可能由弧線、曲線、橢圓形、線條和矩形組成的複雜圖形。

span.span: Represents a complex shape that may be composed of arcs, curves, ellipses, lines, and rectangles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個物件定義的集合物件。Each object defines a collection of objects. 每個物件會組成一或多個物件，例如和，這實際上會定義其圖形。Each of the objects is composed of one or more objects, such as and , which actually define their shape. 填滿的區域所包含的定義具有物件及其屬性設定為`true`並套用判斷括住的區域。The filled area of the is defined by taking all of the contained objects that have their property set to `true` and applying the to determine the enclosed area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *moveAndDrawCommands**moveAndDrawCommands* 一或多個移動和繪製命令。One or more move and draw commands. 請參閱[路徑標記語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/path-markup-syntax.md)。See [Path Markup Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/path-markup-syntax.md). *oneOrMoreFigures**oneOrMoreFigures* 一或多個物件。One or more objects. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 取得或設定設定值，以判斷此 所含之交集區域的合併方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how the intersecting areas contained in this are combined.

value.span: 指出此 之交集區域的合併方式。

span.span: Indicates how the intersecting areas of this are combined.
The default value is EvenOdd.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **EvenOdd**從該點朝任意方向繪製無限遠的光線，並且計算給定圖案中與光線相交的路徑區段數目所決定的 「 向內程度 」 的圖形上的點。**EvenOdd** Determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and counting the number of path segments from the given shape that the ray crosses. 如果這個數字是奇數，該點即是在區域內；如為偶數，該點即在區域外。If this number is odd, the point is inside; if even, the point is outside. **非零**會決定從該點朝任意方向繪製無限遠的光線，然後檢查圖案線段與光線交的所在位置的 「 向內程度 」 的圖形上的點。**NonZero** Determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and then examining the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray. 從零開始計算，路徑線段每次從左到右與光線交會就加一，每次從右到左與光線交會就減一。Starting with a count of zero, add one each time a Segment crosses the ray from left to right and subtract one each time a path segment crosses the ray from right to left. 計算交會後，如果結果為零，則點即在路徑外。After counting the crossings, if the result is zero then the point is outside the path. 否則就在路徑內。Otherwise, it is inside. ![填滿規則圖例](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "填滿規則圖例")![Fill rule illustration](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "Fill rule illustration") FillRule 範例FillRule Example ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
